title: Ava Thirumbipaarthu Lyrics Kalakalappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ava Thirumbipaarthu
Singer: Karthik & Anitha
Movie: Kalakalappu @ Masala Cafe

Unnoda pesa, unnoda palaga
unnodA sirika, assai illa

Un pera ketka, un kanna paatka
manasa iulluka, aengavilla
naan paarthathile
unnai pola yaarumilla

Ava Thirumbipaarthu mella siricha
en mansa konjam kollai adicha (2)

Ennakenna aachu ada theriyavilla
en kaalu tharayathaan thodavumilla (2)

Enna paathukitte paathukitte nadakure
aana paakaamale povadhupol nadikura
Oru poona kutti pola enna meratura
haiyo ennaennamo pannura

Ava Thirumbipaarthu mella siricha
en mansa konjam kollai adicha
Unnoda pesa, unnoda palaga
unnodA sirika, assai illa ..

Munkoba moochazhaga
muthu muthu pechazhaga
mullaichara pallazhaga
onnum puriyum padi illa

8-am pirai nilavazhaga
aerunethi mugam azhaga
7-adukku udal azhaga
aedhum velangaliye ulla

Enna petha magaraasi
paathuvacha silai pola
kannu munna vandhaale
ini sethaalum iva koodathaan

Enna paathukitte paathukitte nadakure
aana paakaamale povadhupol nadikura
Oru poona kutti pola enna meratura
haiyo ennaennamo pannura

Eppavume iva mugatha
parthukitte irukanumpol
nenjuvadam thavikuthappa
suga avasthaiyinu sonnen

Kathirika narukayila
appalatha porikayila
vaanaliyil varukayila
iva nenapil vendhu ninnen

kumbakonam kaaveri
un kaadhil ragasiyama
en kadhal sollaadha
adi aathaadi en aalunee

Enna paathukitte paathukitte nadakure
aana paakaamale povadhupol nadikura
Oru poona kutti pola enna meratura
haiyo ennaennamo pannura
